qa.q: Can I start the process before relocating to {{state}}?
qa.a: Yes. Document architecture and major preparation steps can be completed remotely.

qa.q: How long does a typical case take?
qa.a: It depends on category, evidence quality, and authority timelines. We model a conservative schedule.
